page.name: Module 3: Designing your pre-apprenticeship
page.content:
This module is all about designing your pre-apprenticeship program â€” from setting entry requirements to identifying and integrating support services. 

This module is intended to help you make decisions about:

  • Entry and screening requirements for your program.
  • Key elements of your program, such as duration and mode of delivery.
  • The skills and credentials Participants will gain through your program.
  • The support services the program will provide, either directly or through external partners.
